i1.name: Eternal Hunger
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Warwick's''' basic attacks deal {{pp|10 to 44}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} [[on-hit]].

While {{as|{{sti|health|below 50% '''maximum''' health}}}} he is also {{tip|heal|healed}} by the amount of post-mitigation damage ''Eternal Hunger'' deals. This healing is increased{{ft|by 150%|to {{pp|10*2.5 to 44*2.5}}}}while {{as|{{sti|health|below 25% '''maximum''' health}}}}.
i1.notes:
* The enhanced attack will apply other on-hit effects and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the '''bonus''' damage cannot).
* ''Eternal Hunger'' does not affect structures.

q1.name: Jaws of the Beast
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' {{tip|dashes}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} to the target enemy and bites them, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, applying {{tip|on-hit}} and [[on-attack]] effects and {{tip|heal|healing}} himself for a portion of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} dealt. ''The on-hits apply after the healing is calculated.''

If ''Jaws of the Beast'' is held, '''Warwick''' will lock his teeth into his target and use them to swing himself around to their far side. '''Warwick''' is {{tip|pacify|unable to act}} while swinging around his target, and will move wherever they move until he jumps off. '''Warwick''' is ''unstoppable'' while attached to an enemy.
q1.notes:
* The ability will not cancel if the target dies during its cast time.
* '''Warwick''' cannot be {{tip|airborne|displaced}} while attached to an enemy, but can be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} prior to reaching them.
* The button must be held until Warwick reaches his target to trigger the second effect. 
* While ''Jaws of the Beast'' does not use Quick Casting by default, click-and-hold is comparable to the input required to use {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}} or {{ai|Decimating Smash|Sion}} while using Quick Casting. It does not accept two-click input (e.g. First Cast and Second Cast) that Standard Casters will be used to on the aforementioned abilities.
* The distance traveled past the target depends on how long the ability was held after '''Warwick''' reached the target.

w1.name: Blood Hunt
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Warwick''' senses all enemy {{tip|champions}} below {{as|{{sti|health|below 50% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}, marking them as ''Blood Hunted'' as well as highlighting their position to his team. '''Warwick''' additionally sees a "blood trail" highlighting the shortest path to the ''Blood Hunted'' target, and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while following it.
'''Warwick''' also gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} upon attacking a ''Blood Hunted'' target or an enemy unit {{as|{{sti|health|below 50% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
The '''bonus''' movement and attack speed is increased by 150% against enemies {{as|{{sti|health|below 20% '''maximum''' health}}}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' briefly senses all enemies and then ''Blood Hunts'' the nearest enemy champion within a large radius for 8 seconds, regardless of their {{as|{{sti|health|'''current''' health}}}}.

After being in combat with a champion, ''Blood Hunt'' may only be activated passively for 3 seconds. Its bonus movement speed will also be lost for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, but will build up again every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over the next {{fd|3.5}} seconds.
w1.notes:
* Enemies who are ''Blood Hunted'' will display a red wolf mark on their heads while ominous music will replace their Summoner's Rift default chosen song until they are no longer ''Blood Hunted'', with a small delay.
* ''Blood Hunt'' can detect and target [[Champion_summoned_units#decoys|decoys]].
* The blood trail, altough described as a trail, does '''not''' indicate where the target has been - only the quickest route to their current location, and it will update as you and/or the target move.
* '''Warwick''' will lose his movement speed bonus if enemies that are not ''Blood Hunted'' stay exactly between him and the ''Blood Hunted'' target.
* ''Blood Hunt's'' passive only senses enemies that go below the {{as|health}} threshold while '''Warwick''' is alive. A unit that went below 50% health while '''Warwick''' was dead and has not taken damage while he is alive will not be detected by ''Blood Hunt'' until it falls low again.
** Same applies to enemy champions that went under the threshold by taking [[Nexus Obelisk]] damage or to units that spawn with their current health below the threshold (i.e {{ai|Hallucinate|Shaco}}, {{ai|Mirror Image|LeBlanc}}).
* The detection from ''Blood Hunt'' is more similar to {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Tremor Sense}} than a form of sight - it grants positional information only. It does not explicitly inform '''Warwick''' about who is low health or if they are alone.

e1.name: Primal Howl
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Warwick''' reduces all incoming damage received for {{fd|2.5}} seconds. After 1 second, ''Primal Howl'' can be re-activated, and automatically does so after {{fd|2.5}} seconds.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Warwick''' unleashes a howl, ending the [[damage modifier|damage reduction]] in the process, and causes all nearby enemies to {{tip|flee}} for 1 second as well as {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 90%.
Landing {{ai|Infinite Duress|Warwick}} will instantly reactivate ''Primal Howl'' without prematurely ending the damage reduction buff.
e1.notes:
* The second activation will cancel '''Warwick's''' basic attack.
** '''Warwick''' cannot attack during the animation.

r1.name: Infinite Duress
r1.target_range: {{tt|{{as|250% '''current''' Movement Speed}}|The range can change mid-air, potentially stopping the dash}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Warwick''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} in the target direction, {{tip|suppression|suppressing}} the first enemy {{tip|champion}} he collides with for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

'''Warwick''' {{tip|channels}} while the target is {{tip|suppression|suppressed}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} by hitting the target up to 6 times while also applying {{tip|on-hit}} and [[on-attack]] effects up to 3 times. ''Infinite Duress'' {{sti|heals}} '''Warwick''' for all the damage dealt.
r1.notes:
* There is a brief delay before the leap and the target suppression can begin.
* The dash will be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} instantly if an enemy {{tip|blink|blinks}} in front of '''Warwick'''.
* The minimum range of the ability is 275 units, based on the minimum movement speed that a champion can have (110) while still being able to move. The "base" range of this ability is {{fd|837.5}} because of his 335 base movement speed.
** Considering movement speed soft caps, with {{ai|Blood Hunt|Warwick}}, this range increases to {{ap|(335*1.35*0.8+83)*2.5|(335*1.4*0.8+83)*2.5|(335*1.45*0.8+83)*2.5|(335*1.5*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*1.55*0.5+230)*2.5}}, further increased to {{ap|(335*(1+0.35*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.4*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.45*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.5*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5|(335*(1+0.55*2.5)*0.5+230)*2.5}} against enemy champions {{as|below 20% health}}.
* The 6 hits are done in cycles of 2 hits every {{fd|0.5}} seconds. The first hit deals 2/9 of the total damage and triggers the on-hit effects once while the second hit deals 1/9 of it.
* The healing is increased by {{sti|life steal}}.
* If '''Warwick''' does not collide with a champion, he will slide a {{tt|fixed distance|estimated 150 units}} past the maximum range during which he is {{tip|disarm|disarmed}} and unable to cast movement abilities, including {{si|Flash}}, but being able to cast {{ai|Jaws of the Beast|Warwick}} and {{ai|Blood Hunt|Warwick}}, with the former also interrupting the slide.
** '''Warwick''' is able to cast {{ai|Primal Howl}} at any time during the leap.
